lib/actions/BackendAction.START_DESCRIPTION: Establish a connection to the development system
lib/actions/BackendAction.START_INSPECT_DESCRIPTION: allow inspection tools to connect for the debugging of backend extensions
lib/actions/BackendAction.CHECK_STEP_ATTACHED: Check if the extension containing this step is attached
lib/actions/BackendAction.ALL_PIPELINES_SYNCED: All pipelines are in sync now
lib/actions/BackendAction.PIPELINE_EXTENSION_NOT_ATTACHED: The extension of the pipeline is not attached --> skip
lib/actions/BackendAction.ERROR_BACKEND_ALREADY_RUNNING: Backend process is already running with pid: {pid}. Please quit this process first.
lib/actions/BackendAction.ERROR_ACTIVATING_PIPELINES: Error while activating local pipelines on the remote server
lib/actions/BackendAction.ERROR_CHECK_INVALID_PIPELINE: invalid pipeline; check the pipeline.id property in {file}
lib/actions/BackendAction.ERROR_PIPELINE_ID_SHOULD_MATCH_FILENAME: Pipeline ID "{pipelineId}" should match its file name!
lib/actions/BackendAction.ERROR_PIPELINE_ID_AND_FILENAME_MISMATCH: Pipeline ID "{pipelineId}" and file name "{filename}" mismatch! The ID of a pipeline and its file name should be the same.

lib/actions/ExtensionAction.CREATE_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Types of the extension. Possible types are: frontend, backend
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.CREATE_TRUSTED_DESCRIPTION: only valid if you're about to create a backend extension
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ATTACH_EXTENSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Folder name of the extensions to attach
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.DETACH_EXTENSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Folder name of the extensions to detach
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: Attaches and detaches extensions via a select picker
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.EXT_UPLOAD_DESCRIPTION: Uploads local extension to Shopgate Developer Center
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.EXT_UPLOAD_EXTENSION_DESCRIPTION: Directory name of the extension to upload
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.EXT_UPLOAD_FORCE_DESCRIPTION: Automatic yes to prompts. Assume "yes" as answer to all prompts
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.EXT_UPLOAD_POLL_INTERVAL_DESCRIPTION: The interval of polling of the uploaded file status, milliseconds
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.THEME_UPLOAD_DESCRIPTION: Uploads local theme to Shopgate Developer Center
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.THEME_UPLOAD_EXTENSION_DESCRIPTION: Directory name of the theme to upload
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.THEME_UPLOAD_FORCE_DESCRIPTION: Automatic yes to prompts. Assume "yes" as answer to all prompts
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.THEME_UPLOAD_POLL_INTERVAL_DESCRIPTION: The interval of polling of the uploaded file status, milliseconds
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.INPUT_EXTENSION_TYPE: What type of extension are you about to create?
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.INPUT_EXTENSION_TRUSTED: Does your backend extension need to run in a trusted environment?
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.INVALID_EXTENSION_TYPE: Please select at least one type
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.INVALID_EXTENSION_NAME: Please provide an extension name in the following format: @<organizationName>/<name>
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_INSTALLING_FRONTEND_DEPENDENCIES: Install process exited with code {code} and signal {signal}
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_CREATE_EXTENSION: An error occured while creating the extension: {err}
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.NO_EXTENSION_IN_DIRECTORY: There is no extension in folder: ''{directory}''. Skipping... Please make sure that you only pass the folder name of the extension as argument.
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.NO_EXTENSIONS_IN_DIRECTORY: There are no extensions in folder ''{directory}''
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.INPUT_AUTO_CREATE_VERSION: Version {extensionVersion} does not exist. Create it automatically?
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_EXTENSION_VERSION_NOT_CREATED: Version {extensionVersion} was not created. Please log in to the Shopgate Developer Center to create it manually, or run the previous command again.
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.INPUT_CANCEL_EXTENSION_VERSION_REVIEW: Version {extensionVersion} has already been submitted for review. Uploading will cancel this review. Do you want to proceed?
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_EXTENSION_VERSION_WAITING_REVIEW: Version {extensionVersion} of {extensionId} is waiting for review
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_FOUND: Extension {extensionId} was not found. Please log in to the Shopgate Developer Center to create it.
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_THEME_NOT_FOUND: Theme was not found. Please log in to the Shopgate Developer Center to create it.
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.BUILDING_EXCLUSION_LIST: Building a list of exclusions based on .gitignore file
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.NO_GITIGNORE_IN_DIRECTORY: .gitignore does not exist in {directory}. Using defaults
lib/actions/ExtensionAction.ERROR_PREPROCESSING_TOO_LONG: Preprocessing is taking longer than expected. Follow the current status by logging in to http://developer.shopgate.com/admin.

lib/actions/FrontendAction.START_DESCRIPTION: Starts the webpack dev server for the frontend development
lib/actions/FrontendAction.START_THEME_DESCRIPTION: The name of the theme that you want to be compiled by webpack.
lib/actions/FrontendAction.START_HOST_DESCRIPTION: The URL or IP address of your local development environment.
lib/actions/FrontendAction.START_PORT_DESCRIPTION: The port to use for accessing the output via browser.
lib/actions/FrontendAction.START_ANALYZE_DESCRIPTION: Whether to analyze the bundle sizes.
lib/actions/FrontendAction.SETUP_DESCRIPTION: Changes the settings for the frontend development
lib/actions/FrontendAction.INPUT_CHOOSE_THEME: Please choose a theme to use
lib/actions/FrontendAction.ERROR_FRONTENT_ALREADY_RUNNING: Frontend process is already running with pid: {pid}. Please quit this process first.
lib/actions/FrontendAction.ERROR_THEME_NOT_FOUND: Can't find theme ''{theme}''. Please make sure you passed the right theme.
lib/actions/FrontendAction.ERROR_NO_FRONTEND_CONFIG: No config with the destination 'frontend' found

lib/actions/InitAction.INIT_APPID_DESCRIPTION: set the Sandbox App ID you want to initialize
lib/actions/InitAction.INIT_FORCE_DESCRIPTION: won't ask for permission for overwriting previously set application
lib/actions/InitAction.REINIT_WARNING:
The application {appId} is currently initialized.

Reinit will delete the following project content:
 - project related settings
 - generated extension/theme config files
 - active (trusted) pipelines
lib/actions/InitAction.INPUT_OVERWRITE_APP: Do you really want to overwrite your current application ({appId})? (y/N)
lib/actions/InitAction.INPUT_IGNORE_RUNNING_PROCESSES: Processe(s): {pids} running, reinit can cause problems in these processes; ignore? (y,N)
lib/actions/InitAction.ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN: You're not logged in! Please run `sgconnect login` again.
lib/actions/InitAction.ERROR_APP_NOT_AVAILABLE_REASON: The application {appId} is not available or permissions are missing (message: {reason}). Please check the application at developer.shopgate.com!

lib/app/AppSettings.ERROR_NOT_SGCONNECT_DIRECTORY: The current folder seems not to be an sgconnect project. Please run sgconnect init first.
